metadata.description: LIFT OFF is Colton Club's first signature cocktail and the leading formula in our first flight: MOONCRAFT.  As our initial offering, Lift Off comes with special benefits including limited shipments of our handcrafted cocktails and a seat on the Colton Council. With notes of mint and cucumber, the drink itself is a refreshing take on a classic â€“ the whiskey sour elevated to new heights.
metadata.name: Formula 1: Lift Off #1
